casebody.data:
Jacqueline BRENNER, et al.
v.
Dr. Ronald M. LEWIS, et al. No. 2018-C-295 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 27, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF CALCASIEU PER CURIAM

Writ granted in part, denied in part. The summary judgment in favor of CHRISTUS St. Patrick Hospital is affirmed. The summary judgment in favor of Ronald M. Lewis, M.D., is reversed. Contested issues of material fact preclude summary judgment. The matter is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings.

GUIDRY, J., would deny.

CLARK, J., would deny.

CLARK, J., dissents.

I would deny.
